description:
The events of the first six episodes are reviewed by the cast members, who provide their own insights into the characters they play, as well as offer a look forward to what lies in store during the second half of the series.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Koi to Majutsu no Illusion de, Muchuu ni Sasechaimasu! Special
恋と魔術のイリュージョンで, 夢中にさせちゃいます! スペシャル
